name: to Give a Leg
description:
The cute Lab Coated Doggo needs an assistant to repair its ding-a-lings: that is just what Roboto was created for!

Unfortunately, it has no legs. Or any arms as well.

But the amputee body of this sophisticated AI has... MAGNETIC SLOT TO EQUIP PROSTHETIC ITEMS! That's right, you have to try them now.

"to Give a Leg" is an original environmental puzzle game focused on the peculiar cooperation between a Robot and its Creator in a vaguely creepy kawaii style.

Give us a Leg: be sure to be generous in your review! (づ｡◕‿‿◕｡)づ
